snippet: TARICA--Morris. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Morris Tarica, who leaves behind a loving family who will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Morris' beloved wife, Shirle...
lead_paragraph: TARICA--Morris. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Morris Tarica, who leaves behind a loving family who will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Morris' beloved wife, Shirley; his children, Andrew (Beth), David (Michele), and Sondra; his grandchildren; and the entire family. Jeffrey A. Schoenfeld, President; Robert S. Kapito, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
